channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mississippi cannot receive mail-in ballots past Election Day, federal appeals court rules
item.description: A federal appeals court ruled Friday that Mississippi's law allowing mail-in ballots to be received up to five days past Election Day violates federal...

item.title: AI’s Game-Changing Potential in Banking: Are You Ready for the Regulatory Risks?
item.description: As regulators continue to refine their understanding of AI and big data, financial institutions have an opportunity to shape the regulatory landscape ...

item.title: Wall Street’s Latest Flood: Private Credit
item.description: Private credit is a treacherous swamp full of opportunists. Is your consultant capable of defying the formidable odds of success?

item.title: Unlocking Stock Market Success: Why You Should Embrace the Skew
item.description: By learning to appreciate positive skew and its associated tail events, investors can unlock the full potential of stock market gains.

item.title: Book Review: Resistance Money: A Philosophical Case for Bitcoin
item.description: Should I add bitcoin to my portfolio? If not, why not? This book will help advisors field these tough client questions.

item.title: Washington DC Sends Ballot Intended For Another Voter To Michigan Resident
item.description: A Hillsdale College VP got a ballot from Washington, D.C. in his Michigan mailbox. The intended recipient likely never lived there.

item.title: The Week: Kamala Would Nullify Religious-Liberty Protections
item.description: Plus: Trump’s genius McDonald’s stunt.

item.title: No, Trump Is Not a Fascist
item.description: Applying the F-word to Trump must be emotionally satisfying for the Left, whether it makes sense on the merits or politically.

item.title: GOP lawmakers, leaders react to Israel's retaliatory strikes against Iran: 'America stands with Israel'
item.description: Republican lawmakers and leaders reacted after Israel unleashed a targeted strike against Iran in response to the Islamic State's attack earlier this ...

item.title: Russian actors made fake video depicting mail-in ballots for Trump being destroyed, FBI says
item.description: A video that showed mail-in ballots for Trump apparently being destroyed in a suburban Philadelphia county took off quickly on social media Thursday a...

item.title: Biden apologizes for federal Indian boarding schools: 'One of the most horrific chapters in American history'
item.description: President Biden on Friday delivered a formal apology from the government for the Federal Indian Boarding School Initiative that lasted until 1969.

item.title: 'Black Insurrectionist' social media account linked to 51-year-old White man from upstate New York
item.description: The Black Insurrectionist account is linked directly to Jason G. Palmer, who has his own questionable backstory, starting with the fact that he isn't ...

item.title: The Democratic Party Has Abandoned Pro-Lifers Like Me
item.description: What was once a shared commitment to providing resources for pregnant women has been replaced by an agenda promoting abortion without limits.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Mike Johnson marks full year as House speaker, drafts GOP playbook for next Congress
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson has developed a playbook for a Republican-controlled Congress to jumpstart Donald Trump's second-term agenda.

item.title: Democrats In North Carolina’s Helene Disaster Area Block Emergency Early Voting Locations
item.description: Democrats blocking the early voting sites gives credence to concerns that the left is trying to suppress the vote in the deep-red area.

item.title: The Alternative Investment Gender Gap: Marketing to Female Clients
item.description: What are women's favorite alternative investments? What marketing strategies resonate with women, and which one's don't?

item.title: 'The worst thing I've ever heard': Holocaust survivor blasts Harris for comparing Trump to Hitler
item.description: The Trump campaign released an advertisement Friday featuring a Holocaust survivor slamming Kamala Harris for comparing Donald Trump to Hitler.

item.title: Russia is supplying Houthis with satellite data to attack ships in the Red Sea: report
item.description: Russia has been aiding the Houthis’ assault on Western shipping lanes in the Red Sea by providing them targeting data.

item.title: Israel just launched an airstrike against Iran, following through on weeks of threats and escalating Mideast conflict
item.description: The attack, threatened for weeks by Israel, comes as the Middle East sits on the precipice of a regional war.

item.title: Texas man punches election worker who told him to remove Trump hat at voting site, police say
item.description: The suspect, identified as Jesse Lutzenberger, remained in jail Friday evening, according to Bexar County records.

item.title: Wisconsin Republican Mayor Faces Aftermath Of ‘Very Political’ Raid Over Ballot Drop Box
item.description: As The Federalist first reported, the state's leftist AG cranked up an investigation into the mayor for moving an unsecured ballot drop box.

item.title: Red Lobster is on a hiring spree to replace its C-suite in the aftermath of the endless shrimp debacle
item.description: The seafood chain appointed a new chief marketing officer and chief financial officer.

item.title: Inside JD Vance’s wealth: From hillbilly beginnings to a bestselling author with three homes and millions in assets
item.description: The Ohio senator and Trump VP pick has made a fortune on sales of his 'Hillbilly Elegy' memoir.

item.title: Trump’s Proposed Tax Cuts
item.description: Our economy is plagued with the unintended consequences of short-sighted policies.

item.title: ‘Thought Crime’ Is Now a Reality in the U.K.
item.description: Praying silently in front of an abortion facility can now put you at legal risk in the United Kingdom — and even stricter rules are on the way.

item.title: Trump says he’s ‘really, really rich.’ With a possible presidential victory looming, here’s how much he’s actually worth
item.description: The explosion of Trump Media has led the personal wealth of its founder to skyrocket.

item.title: A 38-year-old with $38,000 in student debt tells other generations, ‘I highly recommend finding a way to avoid taking out loans’
item.description: "When you’re 17 or 18 years old, you think, ‘Oh, sure, I’ll figure this out.’ Then it's frustrating to still be in this financial situation."

item.title: Report: More Than 300 Registrants Confirm They Shouldn’t Be On Nevada’s Voter Rolls
item.description: 'The voter rolls are still dirty. We know it, and now we can prove it,' COF President Chuck Muth told The Federalist.

item.description: Get the latest updates from the 2024 campaign trail, exclusive interviews and more Fox News politics content.

item.title: Lawmakers Demand Details Of Feds Snaking Censorship Through Private Companies
item.description: On Thursday, Sen. Eric Schmitt asked social media companies to disclose recent government demands for removing Americans' speech from their platforms.
